manticore.presentation.swing.terminal
Class ConsoleOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
          manticore.presentation.swing.terminal.ConsoleOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable
public class ConsoleOutputStream
extends java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream

Byte array output stream that can be related to a Swing JTextComponent to be the output of a terminal.

Creates a new ConsoleOutputStream that uses textComponent as output destination with color textColor.

Parameters:
textComponent - The JTextComponent that is going to show the output
textColor - Color of the output
isAppend - True if append mode should be enabled, false otherwise
